title: Quilt & Co. Wine Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, May 28, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a special tasting featuring a dynamic lineup from Copper Cane Wines, the celebrated portfolio by winemaker Joe Wagner. This selection showcases the bold character and refined elegance of Napa Valley and beyond.

Tasting Fee: $30 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines:

• Quilt Cabernet Sauvignon 2022 – 94 pts, Tasting Panel. Rich and complex with dark fruits, chocolate cherry, toffee, and a velvety, fruit-forward finish.

• Böen Pinot Noir Reserve – 95 pts, Wine Enthusiast. Lush and vibrant with ripe boysenberry, blueberry, cocoa, and rosemary, framed by firm tannins.

• Quilt Chardonnay 2022 – 93 pts, Tasting Panel. Bright and balanced with pear, yellow apple, lemon balm, and a smooth, creamy finish.

• Belle Glos Oeil de Perdrix Pinot Noir Blanc 2023 – 94 pts, James Suckling. Exotic and expressive with raspberry, cinnamon cream, white chocolate, and fine acidity.

Taste through this curated flight of high-scoring wines from one of California’s most recognized names—buy a bottle and your tasting is free.
